app.noInternet: No Internet connection. Make sure that Wi-Fi or mobile data is turned on,then try again

inputValidation.userNameValidation1: Username can only contain a-z,0-9, _ , . and @
inputValidation.userNameValidation2: Username cannot begin with _ or . and together
inputValidation.userNameValidation3: Username can contain only 6 to 30 characters
inputValidation.userNameRegExpValidation: Username only contain a-z, 0-9, _ and . and must start with letter
inputValidation.userNameMin: Username length should be greater than or equal to 6
inputValidation.userNameMax: Username length should be less than 20
inputValidation.passwordRegExpValidation: Password only contain a-z, 0-9, _ and must start with letter
inputValidation.passwordMin: Password length should be greater than 6
inputValidation.passwordMax: Password length should be less than 15
inputValidation.mobileMatch: Mobile number is not valid (must start with 6,7,8 9)
inputValidation.mobileRequired: Mobile number is a required field
inputValidation.otpLength: otp length should be equal to 6
inputValidation.otpSendMessage: Enter the Otp which sent to mobile number
